Control Name: 2.12.6 Direct write access to infrastructure is not possible and all resources are provisioned or configured through IaC processes.
Control Statement: It is recommended that even small operational changes and modifications be implemented as-code to track changes and ensure they are fully reproducible and revertible. No infrastructure changes should be done manually outside of IaC.
